Room.Name: Outside the Gate of the Goblin Village
Room.Description: You are in a dimly lit clearing in a dense forest, surrounded by tall trees and thick undergrowth. In the center of the clearing is a large iron gate, guarded by two fierce-looking goblins with scowling expressions. The air is thick with the smell of damp earth and rotting leaves, and the only sounds are the rustling of leaves and the occasional hoot of an owl

Room.Name: Inside the Goblin Village
Room.Description: This is a chaotic and eerie place, filled with strange noises and foul smells. The village is a maze of ramshackle huts made from scraps of wood and metal, with twisted pathways snaking between them. Goblins of all shapes and sizes scurry around, shouting at each other in their guttural language and causing a general commotion. The ground is slick with slime and mud, and strange creatures lurk in the shadows, their glowing eyes watching from the darkness. In the center of the village is a tall totem pole decorated with crude symbols and bones, signifying the goblins' devotion to their dark gods.

Room.Name: Inside the Goblin Village
Room.Description: This is a chaotic and eerie place, filled with strange noises and foul smells. The village is a maze of ramshackle huts made from scraps of wood and metal, with twisted pathways snaking between them. Room.Name: Inside the Goblin Village
Room.Description: This is a chaotic and eerie place, filled with strange noises and foul smells. The village is a maze of ramshackle huts made from scraps of wood and metal, with twisted pathways snaking between them. Goblins of all shapes and sizes scurry around, shouting at each other in their guttural language and causing a general commotion. The ground is slick with slime and mud, and strange creatures lurk in the shadows, their glowing eyes watching from the darkness. In the center of the village is a tall totem pole decorated with crude symbols and bones, signifying the goblins' devotion to their dark gods.

Room.Name: Outside a goblin hut
Room.Description: Outside this goblin hut, the air is thick with the smell of rotting meat and dirty fur. The hut itself is small and made of rough-hewn wood and scraps of metal, barely standing upright. A single door, crudely carved from a slab of bark, creaks in the wind, inviting those brave enough to enter. The ground around the hut is littered with bones and scraps of food, evidence of the goblins' voracious appetite. From inside the hut, strange noises can be heard, like the hiss of a snake and the muffled screeches of small creatures.

Room.Name: Inside a goblin hut
Room.Description: A goblin hut is a small, crudely-built dwelling. It is made of dirt, stone, and scavenged wood, metal and other stuff. The hut itself is small and cramped, with a low ceiling, and just one room that serves as both living and sleeping quarters. The interior of the hut is dimly lit, with little to no natural light coming through, and the air is musty and damp. The goblin's possessions are cluttered and strewn about, including weapons, tools, and undoubtedly, stolen goods. The furniture is makeshift and uncomfortable.

Room.Name: Outside a goblin hut
Room.Description: Outside this goblin hut, the air is thick with the smell of rotting meat and dirty fur. Room.Name: Inside the Goblin Village
Room.Description: This is a chaotic and eerie place, filled with strange noises and foul smells. The village is a maze of ramshackle huts made from scraps of wood and metal, with twisted pathways snaking between them. Goblins of all shapes and sizes scurry around, shouting at each other in their guttural language and causing a general commotion. The ground is slick with slime and mud, and strange creatures lurk in the shadows, their glowing eyes watching from the darkness. In the center of the village is a tall totem pole decorated with crude symbols and bones, signifying the goblins' devotion to their dark gods.

Room.Name: A cave entrance in the Goblin Village
Room.Description: The entrance to this cave in the Goblin Village is a foreboding sight. The opening is narrow, and the jagged rocks that surround it seem to reach out like grasping claws. The air is damp and musty, and the sound of dripping water echoes from deep within. The walls of the cave are covered in strange markings and symbols, drawn in what looks like dried blood. As you step closer, you can hear the faint whispering of goblin voices, and the occasional clanging of metal. The darkness inside is impenetrable, and it's impossible to know what dangers await those who dare to venture inside.

Room.Name: Inside of a cave in the Goblin Village
Room.Description: The air is thick with the smell of damp earth and decay. The walls are slick with moisture, and small puddles of water dot the uneven ground. The darkness is almost absolute, broken only by the flicker of small torches held by the goblin guards. The sounds of dripping water are constant, echoing through the cavern like an ominous heartbeat. The cave is filled with strange shadows and twisted shapes, making it difficult to tell what lies ahead. The only certainty is that danger lurks in the darkness, waiting to pounce on unsuspecting adventurers who dare to venture too far.

Room.Name: Inside of a cave in the Goblin Village
Room.Description: The air is thick with the smell of damp earth and decay. The walls are slick with moisture, and small puddles of water dot the uneven ground. The darkness is almost absolute, broken only by the flicker of small torches held by the goblin guards. The sounds of dripping water are constant, echoing through the cavern like an ominous heartbeat. Room.Description: The air is thick with the smell of damp earth and decay. The walls are slick with moisture, and small puddles of water dot the uneven ground. Room.Name: The commander's room
Room.Description: The walls are adorned with trophies of battle, including weapons and armor from defeated foes. The air is thick with the smell of smoke and brimstone, and the only light comes from a large brazier in the center of the room, casting eerie shadows on the walls. The room is sparsely furnished, with only a few simple wooden chairs and a crude desk carved from stone. At the back of the room sits a large throne, made from the bones of fallen enemies and draped with tattered banners.

Room.Name: Outside a prison cell
Room.Description: The walls are rough and uneven, made of natural rock formations, and the ground is covered with a thin layer of dirt and debris. The cell itself is made of rusted iron bars, separating the prisoner from the outside world. The sounds from inside the cell are muffled, but the occasional groan or whimper can be heard. The air inside the cell is musty and stale, and the only light comes from a flickering torch mounted on the wall. The atmosphere outside the prison cell is oppressive.

Room.Name: Inside a prison cell
Room.Description: Inside the prison cell, the air is thick with the smell of dampness and decay. The walls are rough and uneven, made of cold, hard stone, and the floor is littered with straw and dirt. The cell is small and cramped, with rusted iron bars separating the prisoner from the outside world. The only light comes from a small torch mounted on the wall, casting eerie shadows on the rough stone walls. The air is cold and musty, and the sounds from outside the cell are muffled and distant. The atmosphere inside the prison cell is oppressive, with a feeling of hopelessness and despair that seems to seep into every crevice.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Underdark
Room.Description: You stand at the entrance to a rough-hewn, dark tunnel. The walls are painted with dried blood and grime. There is only the darkness of the deep.

Room.Name: The Underdark
Room.Description: You stand in a rough-hewn, dark tunnel. The walls are painted with dried blood and grime. There is only the darkness of the deep.

NPC.name: goblin guard
NPC.description: A goblin guard is a small, green-skinned humanoid with pointed ears, sharp teeth, and a long nose. He may be mischievous or malicious. He is part of the goblin clan here.
NPC.longDescription: A goblin guard stands here, spear at the ready.

NPC.name: goblin citizen female
NPC.description: A female goblin is a small, green-skinned humanoid with pointed ears, sharp teeth, and a long nose. She may be mischievous or malicious. She is part of the goblin clan here.
NPC.longDescription: A female goblin citizen is here.

NPC.name: goblin citizen male
NPC.description: A male goblin is a small, green-skinned humanoid with pointed ears, sharp teeth, and a long nose. He may be mischievous or malicious. He is part of the goblin clan here.
NPC.longDescription: A male goblin citizen is here.

NPC.name: troll commander
NPC.longDescription: The troll commander stands here, making plans for his goblins and orcs.

NPC.name: orcish guard
NPC.longDescription: An orcish guard stands at watch here.

Item.Name: crude spear
Item.LongDescription: A crude spear lays here, abandoned.

Item.Name: cruel battleaxe axe
Item.LongDescription: A cruel looking battleaxe lies here.

Item.Name: wide bronze belt
Item.LongDescription: A wide bronze belt is lying here.
